channel.title: How to change players names?
channel.description:
How do you change a player's in game name correctly? After trying... had to remake the character.
Also: When switching from one server to another, how do I import pre-existing characters? Example: We have been using source code "A". We found source code "B" and decided it was better. How can we take the characters from source "A" and put them on "B" without having to remake the characters?

item.title: How to change players names?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Your using demonik? lol. Good times.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change players names?
item.dc:creator: @P_E_A_C_E P_E_A_C_E
item.description:
@P_E_A_C_E wrote:

Ok thanks. I’m gonna be going from Dommis’s source to Ko9’s source as it’s more developed.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change players names?
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

There’s a username hash for each character (if you’re using RSCD source). Look in functions at encode_username()

If the sources are the same base (RSCD) and the db structure is the same, you can just export/import the players table from phpmyadmin.

Read full topic
